DOC.brief_title: A Comparative Study Local Allergic Responses Bee Venom Essential Bee Venom Pharmacopuncture
DOC.detailed_description: This double-blinded randomized clinical trial investigates difference allergic response elicit Bee Venom ( BV ) Essential Bee Venom ( eBV ) . Twenty healthy volunteer age 20-40 year randomly allocate 2 group administer eBV BV leave right forearm , respectively , accordance group allocation . Physician , participant , outcome assessor blind group allocation . Local pain , swell , itch , redness , wheal adverse reaction record timepoint treatment .
DOC.criteria: Individuals prior exposure bee venom treatment Healthy individual gender , 20 39 year old Individuals able communicate thought Voluntary participant provide write consent Individuals medication chronic disease ( i.e . hypertension , hyperlipidemia ) Individuals past history allergic dermatitis Individuals past history adverse event follow bee sting Individuals symptom common cold Individuals fear bee venom intervention refuse participate
